Uses of Enum Class
com.financial.services.BudgetType

Packages that use BudgetType
Package
Description
com.financial.entries
Contains the core data models for the budget management system.
com.financial.services
The central service layer of the application, orchestrating financial logic across all budget sectors.
com.financial.services.expenses
Provides specialized services and logic for managing budget expenses at the entity and service levels.
com.financial.services.revenues
Provides specialized services and interfaces for managing budget revenue logic, amount modifications, and state history.
